title: Artificial Reef champion vote! (congrats you did it!)
body:
~~~~~~~~~~~~
Voting has **closed**
Update: Naut won! With a huge 50.7% of votes!

http://i.imgur.com/5uAH3eQ.png
~~~~~~~~~~~~


Well Oceania you did it! And in record time! Congratulations!

So, the major challenge. A  champion-themed artificial reef of Fizz, Nami or Nautilus will be placed in the ocean along with the names of each and every Summoner who participated and made Ocean Week great.

Now this won't be something that happens over night. Once you pick the champion themed artificial reef we'll have it designed and created so that it's awesome. Once that's done we'll need to find a place for him/her. Finding a location could take a while, because like you we want to make sure Fizz/Nami/Nautilus ends up in a location where he/she will have a positive impact on the environment. But don't worry, it's going to happen!

SO, now the important question Oceania. Who do you want placed in the Ocean to represent you and your accomplishments? You have Fizz, Nami or Nautilus. 

The voting will be open from now until the 30th of Jan 2015. So take your time and think it over. Who represents us? Who will look the coolest? Who will make the best reef?

Once again a massive thanks to you. We issued a challenge and you didn't just achieve it, you smashed it. Together. As a community. As Oceania.

GGWP!

http://i.imgur.com/Q1EAPih.png

Will we be shown the statue once it's made (not necessarily submerged)?
We'll get progress pics when it's being created. It will take a bit of time but we'll keep you updated =)
is the site going to be possible to scuba dive at?

Dear RITO,

Might I suggest Moreton Bay, off Redcliffe as a potential location?

The bay itself is primarily featureless other than the tiny scarborough Reef, just off the NE'ern corner of the peninsula. It also contains depths varying between 2 metres deep and the rare 30 metre trench (but mostly 2.5 - 7 metres of flat bottom until you're most of the way over to Moreton Island). The bay itself, once you venture more than a few metres offshore (bar a few select locations), is primarily a sandy, structureless bottom with the rare gravel patch, and occasional weedy area.

A reef or several linking the famous reefs of Moreton Island (such as Curtin Artificial Reef) to the mainland would assist in creating a fish 'highway' to the mainland, and could be protected as a Yellow Zone under state or federal law, preserving the reef and making sure people are careful with how it is treated and fished.

This could also promote diving at the area. The swell in Moreton Bay near Redcliffe is primarily 1.4m or less, with the water being nice and clear when it dips below 1.2 - 1.1m, even allowing people to reasonably clearly through 3+ metres of water. Structure such as a themed artificial reef in this area would compliment the already-popular significantly sized artificial reefs over at Moreton Island, but would be accessible to almost everyone rather than only people with boats.

If you have any more questions about this area, I can help you out. I can also point you to the professionals who know the area, patrol the area, and work and live in the area, because they are the best people to ask - those who make the ocean their livelihood and their life (as I do, as a kayak fisherman who only fishes for fun and only takes enough for dinner).

Kind regards,
~Lors

(Vorseth aka "Loren York" RL).
happy australia day!! i voted for fizz because he is one of the most fun champions to play.{{champion:105}}
And also one of the most broken champions too, {{champion:111}} Vote naut, do it for Australia
Should probably have made this more visible to people.

Define 'this' please. 
But, if you mean the voting, it's been on the top of the Ocean Week page since the start.
Or if you mean Ocean Week, it's been plastered across our clients since it started.
And if you mean all of the above, then you need to upgrade your situational awareness, it was hard to miss unless your eyes are closed.

Sidenote: I really hope you don't main support or jungle...
He didn't have wards...{{item:2044}}
Nautilus would be such a cool statue
And it'd make sense too because in his lore he get sunk the the bottom of the ocean, too :O
You cant not vote {{champion:111}} he'll be the biggest and probably the most cool looking for a reef.
Can we have a skin for whichever champion wins? (we all know naut is going to be the winner)
Nah Nami for the win. (there was 14k votes for our reinforcement's so it's doubtful these early 200 votes have much leaning.)

I'd be ***VERY*** disappointed to see it be nami, mermaid sculptures and the like are already commonplace in the world, whereas nautilus doesn't resemble anything other than a big daddy from bioshock, not something that's commonplace in the very least, making it all the more special.

Nautilus - The Titan of the Depths
With a title like that, how could anyone not want a statue of him to be placed at the bottom of the ocean?
Along with his lore, it is just too much of an opportunity to bring a League of Legends champion to life.
Missing this opportunity would be really disappointing, I'm glad to see that he is currently in the lead and I really hope it stays that way.
My sister is dying of happiness, Nautilus is one of her favourites :P
Regardless of which champion takes the dive, congratulations to the Oceanic community for pulling through with this achievement, I hope everyone who contributed feels accomplished!
And thank you Riot, for thinking of such a great idea to bring the community to work together towards one greater goal.
I can't wait until this event unfolds and I hope there is a video of the winning champion getting placed! :D
im picking nautilus because of his hammer thing that he carries.#{{champion:111}}
Notify the Oxford English Dictionary where 'Anchor' has been redefined as 'hammer thing'

So I've said this before but

So I was thinking, because we all destroyed the 275k achievement - with 4 days, 1 hour remaining now - can there be a massive goal at 1 000 000 points? That'll give everyone something to really work towards. The prize could be something along the lines of a 20 win IP boost.

The week is still going so I feel we should give the players something massive to try and achieve. Plus, the webpage is still counting the points even now.

Any opinions on something like this or is it too late to try it?

Nautilus Hype!

Nautilus is a big and strong champion, the people of Oceania are BIG AND STRONG!

I had to vote for my boy Nautilus him being sunk to the bottom of the sea that just fits his lore perfectly as well as you could see fish swimming inside of him instead of just solid statues of {{champion:267}} / {{champion:105}}  honestly i think {{champion:111}}  would look the most thematic and over all the best choice.

Voted for naut {{champion:111}} would love to see a giant statue of nautilus under the sea, plus once sea weed and other sea life grow around it, we will still recognise our big boy naut, maybe dive down to him and take a selfie
Naut would be a way better statue for something like this. Even if he gets dirty, it'll still look something like Naut, too. {{champion:111}}
